grow_event_M1_type_grass/3901_1301_0100_:
’Sup, dude? How’s it goin’?
Lemme know when that battlin’ mood strikes ya!
grow_event_M1_type_grass/3902_1031_0100_:
I wanna battle somebody
as strong as a tsunami!
grow_event_M1_type_grass/3902_1301_0100_:
Yo! Have you been workin’ out with
Crasher Wake? Sweeeet. I’m ready
to go whenever you are, dude!
grow_event_M1_type_grass/3903_1031_0100_:
Train, train!
Train till you crash!
Those are good lines...
grow_event_M1_type_grass/3903_1301_0100_:
Do you know how strong Grass types are?!
We have to train them up if we want to take
on Marlon!
